Direct-TO | November 2018 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning]]> Everything You Ever Wanted to Know About Vertical Navigation (VNAV) <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2018/VNAV4Nov18]]> <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Aug2017/IRS1Aug17]]>
Part Four - Departures and Arrivals
Learn about SIDs, STARS, and CDO Arrivals in Part Four of this multi-part series.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2018/VNAV4Nov18]]>
GoDirect Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2018/GDFSNov18]]> Helping Customers with Controller Pilot Data Link Communication
GoDirect Flight Services uses their in-house test station, a platform that simulates a data link connection to ATC, to make sure the aircraft is configured properly... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2018/GDFSNov18]]> Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2018/SILNov18]]> Next Generation Flight Management System Offset Issue
Honeywell has issued a Service Information Letter (SIL) for operators of certain F7X, F8X, G500, and G600 aircraft... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2018/SILNov18]]>
Engine Insights <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2018/EngInsightsNov18]]> Aircraft De-Icing and its Effects on Auxiliary Power Units
Aircraft de-icing is necessary to eliminate ice on lifting and air induction surfaces, but the process of de-icing can also present severe complications when the fluid comes in contact with the Auxiliary Power Unit... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Nov2018/EngInsightsNov18]]>
